name: Oilers
description:
We present you the game Oilers!

In this game you take oil and gas in different corners of the Earth together with other players.

Depending on the mode of the game before the player may be differences objectives:

  • be the first to produce the planned amount of resources;
  • be the first to produce the planned amount of resources for the specified time;
  • get more resources than other players;
  • get more resources than the rest of the players for the specified time.

The Oilers can be played both with artificial intelligence, and with live players on one computer in hot seat. In addition, players will be able to play in the puzzle mode, where there are no other players, and the only competitors on the way to victory - the limited period of time and the complexity of the card. The future plans and look forward to the opportunity to add a network game on a local network and the Internet.

During the game, players take turns performing acts, performing one action per turn. Players will be able to drill formations, will be able to install additional equipment on the well, will be able to buy new equipment, will be able to install new wells and will be able to capture well the other players.

Planned set of maps of different sizes, for 1 to 8 players, and, thanks to a convenient game editor, the ability to create your own maps, which can be shared in the community of players Oilers.

We launched a free standalone map editor for the game. It has a truly extensive capabilities to create maps, and in addition, also it has a game mode! You can already play with friends on their own maps!
